Package models

Class User

  • java.lang.Object
    • administration.daos.AbstractUserEntity
      • models.User

  • @Entity
public class User
extends AbstractUserEntity
    This class is representing the model for a user. It creates a database entity which is realized in the H2 database. A user has a username, a password, a birthday and a profile picture.

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from class administration.daos.AbstractUserEntity

        created, updated, userId, version
